root.name: Destiny Links
root.description: OverviewDestiny Links is an upcoming Action Role-Playing Game, which is being developed by Namco-Bandai for the Nintendo DS. Currently, there is no set release date for it.GameplayNot much is known about the game for now, other than that it is an Action RPG with online Co-Op, which allows 4 players.
